data.name: Retro Commander - All Maps & Modding
data.detailed_description:
This DLC unlocks all the maps for Retro Commander. Maps are added and updated regularly, so instead of adding them to the DLC itself, they are downloaded from within the game. In particular, the DLC give access to the following.

  • All the maps with their scenarios (including player-modded maps).
  • All the campaign missions including the official campaign.
  • Includes current and upcoming maps that are not released yet.
  • Can be used in single player or multiplayer games including LAN games.
  • Allows uploading your map for others to play.
  • No login is required to download the maps from within the game (you need internet still).
  • No DRM: you can play offline (make sure you download the maps beforehand!).

IMPORTANT: if you already purchased "All Maps & Modding" within the game, you do NOT need to buy the DLC also. Both are the same. The game will prevent you from purchasing the DLC from within the game. It's not possible to do so on the DLC web page however. That said, there will a warning in-game if it finds you have it twice telling you to get a refund.

Base Game is EARLY ACCESS: the base game is still in EARLY ACCESS. That means at the moment the number of maps and campaign missions is limited. The price is reduced to reflect that. By purchasing now, you can support the development of the game and will get access to all the future maps including all the campaign mission but you will have to wait until they become available. If you wait, you will get access to the same, but they price will have increased. Also, there will NOT be any other DLCs for maps or campaigns. This is it.

data.short_description: This DLC unlocks all the maps for Retro Commander.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: 1.8GHz single core
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7.3+
  • Processor: 1.8GHz single core
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux 64bit
  • Processor: 1.8GHz single core
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

package_groups.title: Buy Retro Commander - All Maps & Modding
